text: Reptiles are animals in the class Reptilia. This page is a list of reptiles. This page only includes extant reptiles. Extinct reptiles like the T Rex Won't be included. == infraorder Lepidosauromorpha/superorder Lepidosauria == *Sphenodontia (the tuatara) **Tuatara *Squamata (snakes and lizards) **Toxicofera **Gekkota **Dibamidae **Laterata **Scinciformata == Divison Archosauria (arachosaurs) == *Avemetatarsalia **dinosauria (dinos) ***Aves (cladistically) *Suchia **Crocodilia = Pan-Testinudines (turtles an their extinct relatives.) = Testinudines (turtles)
title: List of reptiles
